user-story.i-want: to finish paying through Stripe Checkout with Craft’s branded flow
user-story.so-that: my purchase stays secure and within the mandated 24-hour window.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: **PAYMENTS CRITICAL**: `payment_checkout_endpoint.dart` creates Stripe Checkout Sessions with idempotency key `auctionId:buyerId`, embeds metadata (`auction_id`, `buyer_id`, `payment_session_id`), and persists expiry in `payment_session_repository.dart`. (Implementation Guide §1)

**WEBHOOK CRITICAL**: `stripe_checkout_webhook.dart` validates signatures via `webhook_signature_validator.dart`, updates payment session + transaction status, and logs Datadog metric `payments.checkout.session_completed`. (Implementation Guide §1, Monitoring & Analytics)

**CLIENT EXPERIENCE**: `payment_checkout_page.dart` launches hosted checkout using `flutter_stripe`, handles return/cancel URLs via `uni_links`, and renders countdown + security copy driven by `payment_bloc.dart`. (Implementation Guide §1)

**ANALYTICS & AUDIT**: Segment events `payments.checkout.started` / `completed` include `payment_session_id`, `auction_id`, `amount_usd`; audit trail entries `checkout_created` & `checkout_completed` stored per session. (Implementation Guide §1, Monitoring & Analytics)

task.description: Update `payment_checkout_endpoint.dart` to call `stripe_service.dart`, enforce idempotency, persist session, and return checkout URL + expiry.
Expand `payment_session_repository.dart` with metadata upsert + expiry helpers; store Stripe checkout ID and timestamps.
Harden `stripe_checkout_webhook.dart` using `webhook_signature_validator.dart` for `checkout.session.completed` and `payment_intent.payment_failed`; create transaction records.
Implement `create_checkout_session_use_case.dart` to hit checkout API, cache `payment_session_id`, and emit analytics via `payments_metrics.dart`.
Update `payment_bloc.dart` and `payment_checkout_page.dart` to launch `flutter_stripe`, render countdown banner, and handle cancel/return flows with toast copy.
Add Sentry breadcrumbs for checkout launch, completion, and cancellation events.
Emit Datadog events `payments.checkout.session_completed` / `failed` and wire to dashboard in `docs/analytics/stripe-payments-dashboard.md`.
Record audit entries `checkout_created` + `checkout_completed` for every session.
